EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited: Tampa Bay Executive Networking Game
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/vip-tampabay]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We are pleased to invite you to an exclusive event on December 2nd, as the Tampa Bay Lightning take on the San Jose Sharks. We're expecting a fantastic evening filled with food, drinks, and of course, hockey. We hope you will accept this invitation to join us, learn more about Turbonomic, and network with your peers in the technology industry. Tampa Bay Lightning vs San Jose Sharks <[[turbonomic.com/vip-tampabay]]>
Where: Amalie Arena 401 Channelside Dr., Tampa, FL 33602 Saturday, December 2nd 6:30pm <[[https://turbonomic.com/vip-tampabay]]>
We hope to see you there,
- The Turbonomic Team
